name: Egg Slash
description:
As revenge for easter, the egg pirates have taken you hostage. Luckily, there are all sort of strange potions laying around to help you slash your way to the exits. How many rooms can you clear?

Controls: 

  • Left click: Attack
  • Right click: Block. If the block happens right before an attack, the enemy takes posture damage. Full posture damage means you can instakill them. You regenerate your own posture by not running and holding up block.
  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • E: Open door
